Author: .ayab
Content:
Mikhail hand was sore from all that writing, who would've think that in the they year 2100s there still be paper documents that needs to be signed. He curses his corporation unwillingness to change, this work that took him hours to complete could've been done in mere minutes with his implants.

But what ca he do?

The system and procedural mathod was written over a hundred years ago and this king of minor documenting; in his department at least, isn't that important for the company success

Author: nerosalt
Content:
Seventeen years since the stars came crashing down on the border states.

I was in primary school, but I saw the stars splitting the skies in half, soaring through the skies like something out of a fairy tale. 

Years later, I’m working for the very government that caused the stars to fall.


The warheads were already in the Great Plains when our AA systems locked on, why so long? Lack of maintenance, low budget, everything you’d expect from a dying government.
Our cyberassault teams tried to redirect the warheads but the fuel was running out and their defences were tough to break. But there was still hope, the fuel was enough to crash the warhead into the middle of the gulf without detonating, their countermeasures were broken. The required scripts were being packaged, compressed, burnt, written, the process was slow but fast enough for us to save America. 
3 minutes to the first detonation, 5 to the last. 
An error in the code.
Decades upon decades of stacked patches and updates, software written to be compatible with century-old hardware, scripts written in a hundred different languages, botch after botch and fix after fix, a labyrinthe of dying code and already dead hardware.

Author: .ayab
Content:
The precious of the few. His light, his guidance will lead us all to the promised place. Oh naught but abandon your cause and love, for §the king and court shall find and set you free.

Divest! Divest yourself from this sinful world, only his action and words alone will light upon you a blinding yellow road toward Carcosa.

Oh sing sing sing in his name, chant your grievances for the king in yellow shall hear. Scream thy torment, weep upon his altar, pray in his name! The king in yellow, oh the king in yellow.

Content: Mikhail woke up with sweat on his brow, his breath uneven and a pain on his left made him jolted

Author: .ayab
Content:
A mark, yellow mark etched upon his skin running through from his fingertips running to his shoulder. It burns, the smell still stings, yet he doesn't mind, and weirdly content with the new marking upon his left.

What was that strange dream, " he spoke with yearn." A haunting and beautiful dream. "

Author: .ayab
Content: As he was about reminisce more to sweet place he just di covered the alarm clock on his implant flared, sharing its horid noice to wake him up. Grumbling as he gets up from his bed the daily motion of his morning too over, only this an extra time in the shower, too engrossed in the scene his brain had conjured for his enjoyment. "The king in yellow," he muttered the name with fondness. "Who might you be" "

Author: nerosalt
Content: the nuclear strikes were a reactionary strike from eurasian nations in retaliation for US aggression in the middle east (in my timeline, the middle eastern wars were longer and much more destructive, ended with the tactical nuking of baghdad), US aggression against Canada (both these maneuvers were due to and enabled by megacorp assistance), and the US tolerating corporate terrorism in its states, climaxing in the bombing of the united nations HQ

Author: nerosalt
Content: the nukes, hastily and recklessly shot down, detonated in Kansas and a few in the states around it,  making the existing drought and desertification worse, creating a radioactive dustbowl, cutting through Arkansas to South Dakota

Author: nerosalt
Content: in the chaos, global megacorps start buying out cities, in retaliation, American megacorps do the same, in the span of half a year, America has turned into a corporate owned hellscape
